annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In addition to the foregoing financings, we received an aggregate of $6.0 billion in financial assistance through the payroll support program (PSP1) established under the CARES Act, all of which was received by the end of September 2020. In connection with our receipt of this financial assistance, AAG issued a promissory note (the PSP1 Promissory Note) to Treasury for $1.8 billion in aggregate principal amount and warrants to purchase up to an aggregate of approximately 14.1 million shares (the PSP1 Warrant Shares) of AAG common stock. See below for further discussion on PSP1.
annotations.translation: 除了上述融资外，我们还通过根据《CARES法案》设立的工资支持计划（PSP1）获得了总额为$60亿的财政援助，所有资金均在2020年9月底之前收到。在我们获得这笔财政援助时，AAG向财政部发行了本金总额为$18亿的本票（PSP1本票）和认股权证，用于购买总共约1410万股AAG普通股（PSP1认股权证）。有关PSP1的进一步讨论，请参见下文。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In January 2021, we received $1.5 billion (of an expected total of at least $3.0 billion) in financial assistance through PSP2. In connection with our receipt of this financial assistance, AAG issued a promissory note (the PSP2 Promissory Note) to Treasury for an initial principal sum of approximately $433 million and warrants to purchase up to an aggregate of approximately 2.8 million shares (the PSP2 Warrant Shares) of AAG common stock. See Note 18 for further discussion on PSP2.
annotations.translation: 2021年1月，我们通过PSP2获得了$15亿（预计总额至少为$30亿）的财政援助。在我们获得这笔财政援助时，AAG向财政部发行了期票（PSP2本票），初始本金约为$4.33亿，并发行了购买总共约280万股（PSP2认股权证）的AAG普通股的认股权证。有关PSP2的进一步讨论，请参阅注释18。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Also, we are permitted to, and have, deferred payment of the employer portion of Social Security taxes through the end of 2020 (with 50% of the deferred amount due December 31, 2021 and the remaining 50% due December 31, 2022). This deferral provided approximately $350 million in additional liquidity during 2020. Additionally, we have suspended our capital return program, including share repurchases and the payment of future dividends for at least the period that the restrictions imposed by the CARES Act and the PSP Extension Law are applicable.
annotations.translation: 此外，我们还获准并已将社会保障税的雇主部分延期支付至 2020 年底（其中 50%的延期金额将于 2021 年 12 月 31 日到期，其余 50%将于 2022 年 12 月 31 日到期）。 这一延期在 2020 年期间提供了约$3.5 亿的额外流动资金。 此外，我们已暂停资本回报计划，包括股票回购和未来股息支付，至少在 CARES 法案和 PSP 扩展法规定的限制适用期间暂停。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: We continue to evaluate future financing opportunities and work with third-party appraisers on valuations of our remaining unencumbered assets.
annotations.translation: 我们将继续评估未来的融资机会，并与第三方评估师合作，对我们余下未担保资产的估值进行评估。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: A significant portion of our debt financing agreements contain covenants requiring us to maintain an aggregate of at least $2.0 billion of unrestricted cash and cash equivalents and amounts available to be drawn under revolving credit facilities and/or contain loan to value, collateral coverage and/or debt service coverage ratio covenants.
annotations.translation: 我们的债务融资协议中有很大一部分包含了要求我们保持总计至少 $20 亿不受限制的现金和现金等价物以及可从循环信贷机制中提取的金额和/或包含贷款价值比、抵押覆盖率和/或偿债覆盖率的契约。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Given the above actions and our current assumptions about the future impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on travel demand, which could be materially different due to the inherent uncertainties of the current operating environment, we expect to meet our cash obligations as well as remain in compliance with the debt covenants in our existing financing agreements for the next 12 months based on our current level of unrestricted cash and short-term investments, our anticipated access to liquidity (including via proceeds from financings and funds from government assistance obtained pursuant to the CARES Act and the PSP Extension Law) and projected cash flows from operations.
annotations.translation: 鉴于上述行动以及我们目前对新冠肺炎疫情对旅行需求的未来影响的假设由于当前运营环境的固有不确定性，这些假设可能存在重大差异，我们预计将在未来12个月内履行我们的现金义务，并根据我们当前的无限制现金和短期投资水平、我们预期的流动性获取（包括通过根据《CARES法案》和《PSP扩展法》获得的融资收益和政府援助资金）以及预计的运营现金流，继续遵守我们现有融资协议中的债务契约。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: On April 20, 2020 (the PSP1 Closing Date), American, Envoy Air Inc. (Envoy), Piedmont Airlines, Inc. (Piedmont) and PSA Airlines, Inc. (PSA and together with American, Envoy and Piedmont, the Subsidiaries), entered into a Payroll Support Program Agreement (the PSP1 Agreement) with Treasury, with respect to PSP1 provided pursuant to the CARES Act. In connection with our entry into the PSP1 Agreement, on the PSP1 Closing Date, AAG also entered into a warrant agreement (the PSP1 Warrant Agreement) with Treasury and issued the PSP1 Promissory Note to Treasury, with the Subsidiaries as guarantors (the Guarantors).
annotations.translation: 2020 年 4 月 20 日（PSP1 结束日），美利坚航空公司、恩沃伊航空公司（恩沃伊）、皮德蒙特航空公司（皮德蒙特）和 PSA 航空公司（PSA，与美利坚航空公司、恩沃伊航空公司和皮德蒙特航空公司合称 "子公司"）与财政部就根据 CARES 法案提供的 PSP1 签订了薪资支持计划协议（PSP1 协议）。 在签订 PSP1 协议的同时，AAG 还于 PSP1 结束日与财政部签订了认股权证协议（PSP1 认股权证协议），并向财政部发行了 PSP1 承兑票据，子公司为担保人（担保人）。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In connection with PSP1, we are required to comply with the relevant provisions of the CARES Act, including the requirement that funds provided pursuant to the PSP1 Agreement be used exclusively for the continuation of payment of eligible employee wages, salaries and benefits, the requirement against involuntary furloughs and reductions in employee pay rates and benefits, which expired on September 30, 2020, the requirement that certain levels of commercial air service be maintained and the provisions that prohibit the repurchase of AAG common stock, and the payment of common stock dividends through at least September 30, 2021, as well as those that restrict the payment of certain executive compensation until March 24, 2022. The PSP1 Agreement also imposes substantial reporting obligations on us. These provisions were subsequently extended upon our entry into PSP2. See Note 18 for further discussion on PSP2. In addition, we have entered into the Treasury Loan Agreement (as defined below) and, as a result, the stock repurchase, dividend and executive compensation restrictions imposed by the Treasury Loan Agreement will remain in place through the date that is one year after the secured loan provided under the Treasury Loan Agreement is fully repaid. See below for additional information on the Treasury Loan Agreement.
annotations.translation: 关于PSP1，我们须遵守《CARES法》的相关规定，包括要求根据PSP1协议提供的资金专门用于继续支付符合条件的雇员工资、薪金和福利，要求非自愿停工和削减雇员薪资和福利已于2020年9月30日到期，要求维持一定程度的商业航空服务，禁止购回AAG普通股，以及至少在2021年9月30日之前支付普通股股股息，以及限制支付的规定2022年3月24日之前的部分高管薪酬。PSP1协定还向我们规定了大量的报告义务。这些规定后来在我们加入《减贫战略文件2》时得到延长。关于次级方案2的进一步讨论见附注18。此外，我们已订立库务贷款协议（定义见下文），因此库务贷款协议施加的股份购回、股息及行政补偿限制将直至库务贷款协议项下提供的有抵押贷款悉数偿还后一年当日仍然有效。有关国库贷款协议的更多信息，请参见下文。
